definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="ambientselec">ambientselec</variable><variable type="Number" id="AmbientSelector">AmbientSelector</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="687" y="595"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:AmbientS</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The variable is set to a random number to allow for variations in ambience</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">These number range selectors are to choose between 4 random choises of ambience</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The AND is used to make sure 2 or more sounds don't play at the same time</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:AmbientS</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.75</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><field
